group.access: User does not have access to group
group.addUser: User does not have permission to add users to the group
group.setAdmin: User does not have permission to manage group admins
group.setAccess: User does not have permission to manage group access
group.delete: User does not have permission to delete the group
group.setName: User does not have permission to change the group name
group.createSplit: User does not have permission to create splits in the group
group.deleteSplit: User does not have permission to delete this split
group.editSplit: User does not have permission to edit this split
group.restoreSplit: User does not have permission to restore this split

joinLink.create: User does not have permission to create join links
joinLink.delete: User does not have permission to delete join links

split.sumOfChangesMustBeZero: Sum of changes must be equal to zero
split.payerNotInTransaction: Payer must be included in the transaction
split.payerMustGetBackSumOthersLose: Payer must get back an equal amount to the sum others lose
split.totalValueMustBePositive: Total value must be greater than zero

group.userAlreadyInGroup: User is already a member of the group
group.userNotInGroup: User is not a member of the group
group.joinLinkAlreadyExists: A join link already exists for this group

splitValidation.atLeastTwoEntries: At least two entries are required
splitValidation.youNeedToFillBothFields: You need to fill both fields in the row
splitValidation.thePayerDataMustBeFilledIn: The payer data must be filled in
